Title: Requires mental health facilities to have a staff member specifically trained in filing assisted outpatient treatment petitions
Summary: Requires mental health facilities to have a staff member specifically trained in filing assisted outpatient treatment petitions and to have patients with mental illness not released from such facilities until they have been registered for available services.
LawCode: Amd ยง9.60, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring certain facilities to have a staff member specifically trained in filing assisted outpatient treatment petitions
